derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin lactatio(n-), from lactare 'suckle', from lac, lact- 'milk'

entry.def: Lactation is the production of milk by women and female mammals during the period after they give birth.

means.word_mean: 1. the period following birth during which milk is secreted;
2. the production and secretion of milk by the mammary glands
3. feeding an infant by giving suck at the breast
